titles.title: Honoring eight marines from the 3rd Battalion 1st Marines who fought in Haditha, Iraq on November 19, 2005.
Honoring eight marines from the 3rd Battalion 1st Marines who fought in Haditha, Iraq on November 19, 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Honors the service of Sergeant Sanick Dela Cruz, Captain Randy Stone, Lance Corporal Justin Sharratt, Captain Lucas McConnell, Lance Corporal Stephen Tatum, Lieutenant Andrew Grayson, Lieutenant Colonel Jeffrey Chessani, and Staff Sergeant Frank Wuterich in the United States Marine Corps;
Mourns the loss of Lance Corporal Miguel Terrazas.
